item.description:
Lisa Trachtman, manager of Abeille (located near the Brookline Village T and Bus 66 in Brookline) has offered to host a meetup. They have taken on a lot of customers and teachers from the recently departed Sparks Craft Studio. You can bring snacks and drinks.
Just bring whatever project you are currently working on. No need to buy anything, but if you need supplies, they have a variety for sale.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Meetup at Abeille in Brookline
